â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Arizona (Navajo: Hoozdo Hahoodzo) is the sixth largest and the 14th     â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ most populous of the 50 states. Southern Arizona is known for its       â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ desert climate, with very hot summers and mild winters. Northern        â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ Arizona features many pine forests, the Colorado Plateau, and some      â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ mountain ranges with much more moderate summer temperatures and         â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ significant winter snowfalls.                                           â–ˆâ–ˆâ–ˆ
